spiritsExplanation:
The workout, titled "Looking After Yourself Cool-Down," strongly focuses on relaxation and self-care, indicative of a "Soothing & Restorative" spirit. The description emphasizes a steady cool-down, aligning with recovery and stress reduction, which justifies a high score of 0.9. The category and workout type further reinforce this as a cooldown session.

Given the imagery of rowing on a river, as shown in the image, an "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit is also relevant, though to a lesser extent due to the session’s intended calming nature. Thus, it receives a moderate score of 0.6.

The workout lacks elements of intensity, structure, and sports-specific agility, leading to the exclusion of other spirits. The focus on indie and alternative music, paired with the calm activity, supports a tranquil and restorative ambiance.
